00043 #define __vtkSpring_h

00045 #include "vtkParticleSpringSystemWin32Header.h"
00046 #include "vtkObject.h"
00047 
00048 class vtkParticle;
00049 class vtkParticleCollection;
00050 
00052 
00057 class VTK_vtkParticleSpringSystem_EXPORT vtkSpring : public vtkObject {
00058 public:
00059 
00061     vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkSpring, vtkObject);
00063     static vtkSpring * New();
00065     void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00066 
00068     vtkSetMacro(Id, vtkIdType);
00070     vtkGetMacro(Id, vtkIdType);
00072     vtkSetMacro(SpringCoefficient, double);
00074     vtkGetMacro(SpringCoefficient, double);
00076     vtkSetMacro(DampingCoefficient, double);
00078     vtkGetMacro(DampingCoefficient, double);
00080     vtkSetMacro(DistanceCoefficient, double);
00082     vtkGetMacro(DistanceCoefficient, double);
00084     vtkSetMacro(DeltaT, double);                    // dt for every step
00086     vtkGetMacro(DeltaT, double);
00088     vtkGetMacro(RestLength, double);                    // Distance between particles
00089 
00091     double * GetDirection();
00092 
00094     void GetDirection(double Direction[3]);
00095 
00097     void InsertNextParticle(vtkParticle * particle);
00098 
00100     void SetParticle(vtkIdType id, vtkParticle * particle);
00101 
00103     vtkParticle * GetParticle(vtkIdType id);
00104 
00106     bool ContainsParticle(vtkParticle * particle);
00107 
00109     void Init();
00110 
00111 protected:
00112     vtkSpring();
00113     ~vtkSpring();
00114 
00116     vtkIdType Id;
00118     double SpringCoefficient;
00120     double DampingCoefficient;
00122     double DistanceCoefficient;
00124     double DeltaT;
00125 
00127     double RestLength;
00129     double Direction[3];
00130 
00132     vtkParticleCollection * Particles;
00133 
00134 private:
00135     vtkSpring(const vtkSpring&);            // Not implemented.
00136     void operator=(const vtkSpring&);           // Not implemented.
00137 
00138 };
